about.title: About SIFS Theory
about.subtitle: Scale-Invariant Fractal Spacetime ‚Äî Unification of physics through fractal geometry
about.description_body: ‚Äî is a unified geometric field theory that combines gravity, quantum mechanics, and cosmology through the fractal geometry of 5-dimensional spacetime. The theory solves fundamental problems of modern physics: mass hierarchy, the nature of dark energy, proton stability, and the black hole information paradox.
about.main_idea_text1: Our 4D universe is a 3-brane in a 5-dimensional fractal bulk spacetime (Randall-Sundrum model). The fifth coordinate S represents physical scale ‚Äî not an abstract parameter, but a real geometric coordinate.
about.main_idea_text2: The scale coordinate covers the entire range from the Planck scale (10‚Åª¬≥‚Åµ m) to the Hubble scale (10¬≤‚Å∂ m), creating a fractal self-similar structure of spacetime. Exponential warping of the metric exp(‚àík|S|) naturally explains why gravity is 10¬≥‚Å∏ times weaker than the strong interaction.
about.calculations_text1: All fundamental constants (G, Œ±, Œ±_s, G_F) are derived from a single geometric axiom without free parameters. Proton mass emerges automatically as a scale-suppressed Planck mass. Dark energy is explained by the drift of the global scale coordinate.
about.calculations_text2: The theory makes 27 testable predictions, 11 of which have already been confirmed by observational data (DESI 2025, Euclid, JWST, EHT). A key achievement is the explanation of evolving dark energy with a >4œÉ deviation from the standard ŒõCDM model, which is consistent with SIFS predictions about scale coordinate drift.

unification.title: Unification
unification.text: A unified geometric basis for all interactions. Gravity, electromagnetism, strong, and weak interactions are all gradients of the vacuum refractive index at different scales.

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.text: 27 testable predictions with specific numerical values. Predictions for colliders (LHC, FCC), gravitational waves (LIGO, Virgo), cosmology (CMB, structure formation).

confirmations.title: Confirmations
confirmations.text: DESI 2025: evolving dark energy (>4œÉ). Euclid/JWST: early massive structures. EHT: polarization flips in M87*. All consistent with the theory without fine-tuning.

achievements_list.mass_hierarchy: Mass Hierarchy: Explanation from Planck scale (10‚Åª¬≥‚Åµ m) to Hubble scale (10¬≤‚Å∂ m) from a single geometric axiom. Proton mass emerges automatically as scale-suppressed Planck mass without introducing it as a parameter.
achievements_list.constants: 8 fundamental constants derived: Gravitational constant G, fine structure constant Œ±, strong coupling constant Œ±_s, Fermi constant G_F, cosmological constant Œõ, and others ‚Äî all from one geometry without free parameters.
achievements_list.desi: DESI 2025: Evolving dark energy with >4œÉ deviation from standard ŒõCDM model fully consistent with SIFS predictions about global scale coordinate drift. This is not a coincidence, but a consequence of geometry.
achievements_list.predictions_count: 27 testable predictions: 11 already confirmed by observational data (DESI, Euclid, JWST, EHT), 4 in verification process, 12 awaiting experimental verification at colliders and gravitational wave detectors.
achievements_list.paradoxes: Paradox Resolution: Black hole information paradox solved via ER=EPR correspondence. Proton stability explained by quantum entanglement and frozen time at the effective horizon.

interactive_calculations.text1: Click on any calculation below to see step-by-step computations with formulas, numerical values, and physical interpretation. All results are obtained from a single geometric axiom (warped 5D metric with scale coordinate S) without free parameters.
interactive_calculations.text2: Each calculation shows: initial formulas, step-by-step calculations with real physical constants, obtained results, and their physical interpretation in the context of SIFS theory. This is not numerology ‚Äî these are consequences of geometry.

abstract.title: Scale-Invariant Fractal Spacetime
abstract.subtitle: SIFS Theory ‚Äî Unification of Quantum Mechanics, Gravity and Cosmology

intro.body: represents a unified geometric field theory that solves fundamental problems of modern physics by introducing a scale coordinate as a real geometric dimension. The theory unifies gravity, quantum mechanics, and cosmology into a single mathematical structure without free parameters.

main.title: üåå Main Concept
main.text: SIFS postulates that our 4D universe is a 3-brane in a 5-dimensional fractal bulk spacetime (Randall-Sundrum type II model), where the fifth coordinate S represents physical scale ‚Äî not an abstract parameter, but a real geometric dimension.
main.subtext: The metric has the form: ds¬≤ = exp(‚àí2k|S|) Œ∑_ŒºŒΩ dx^Œº dx^ŒΩ + dS¬≤, where exponential warping naturally explains the mass hierarchy between the Planck and electroweak scales. The scale coordinate covers the entire range from 10‚Åª¬≥‚Åµ m (Planck) to 10¬≤‚Å∂ m (Hubble), creating a fractal self-similar structure.

particles.title: ‚öõÔ∏è Elementary Particles
particles.text: Protons and electrons are considered as micro-singularities (Kerr-Newman black holes) with effective horizons in the 5D bulk, where mass is suppressed by the RS-warping mechanism: m_obs = M_bulk √ó exp(‚àík|S|).
particles.subtext: For the proton: true mass in bulk M_bulk ‚âà 10¬π‚Å¥ g, but observed mass m_p = 1.67√ó10‚Åª¬≤‚Å¥ g due to suppression by 14 orders of magnitude. Stability is ensured by frozen time at the horizon and the topological invariant of charge. Hawking radiation is exponentially suppressed: œÑ ‚àù exp(2k|S|).

unification.title: üîó Unification of Interactions
unification.text: Gravity and quantum effects are manifestations of warped RS2 geometry + fractal self-similarity. Gordon's optical metric makes all interactions gradients of the vacuum refractive index: F = ‚àí‚àán(r, S).
unification.subtext: All fundamental forces (gravity, electromagnetism, strong, weak) arise as gradients dn/dr at different values of the scale coordinate |S|. Gravity is weak because |S_grav| ‚âà 20, and the strong interaction is strong because |S_QCD| ‚âà 2.8. This is a geometric consequence, not a coincidence.

ouroboros.title: ‚ôæÔ∏è Ouroboros Principle
ouroboros.text: Infinite hierarchy of scales: micro ‚Üî macro. Fractal self-similarity connects the quantum world with cosmological structures through log-periodic oscillations: f(S) = f‚ÇÄ √ó [1 + A cos(œâ ln|S| + œÜ)].
ouroboros.subtext: The structure of matter demonstrates self-similarity: quarks ‚Üí nucleons ‚Üí atoms ‚Üí planets ‚Üí galaxies. Time scales in astrophysical phenomena (accretion, jets, polarization flips) also show log-periodicity, which is confirmed by Event Horizon Telescope observations for M87*.

fractal_slide.title: Fractal Structure of Spacetime
fractal_slide.subtitle: Ouroboros Principle: from Planck to Hubble

insight.title: Central Idea of SIFS
insight.text: Each "particle" is not a point, but a singularity in the 5D bulk, extended along the S coordinate. What we observe as mass and charge is a 4D projection of deep 5D geometry. Scale is not an abstraction, but a physical dimension.

micro.title: Micro-singularities
micro.desc: Proton ‚Äî Kerr-Newman BH (Burinskii), mass suppressed by RS-warping (Randall-Sundrum)

stability.title: Stability
stability.desc: Time dilation at effective horizon (frozen star). Charge ‚Äî topological invariant of the brane

strong.title: Strong Interaction
strong.desc: Gradient dn/dr ‚Üí confinement (optical analogy). Sharp change in vacuum refractive index

dark_energy.title: Dark Energy
dark_energy.desc: Entropic tension of the brane, evolving Œõ_eff (confirmed by DESI 2025)

braneworld.title: Braneworld RS2
braneworld.text: Our 4D universe is localized on a brane in 5-dimensional Anti-de Sitter space. Exponential warping of the metric exp(‚àík|S|) naturally explains the mass hierarchy between the Planck and electroweak scales.

proton_calc.title: Real Calculations: Proton as Micro-singularity
proton_calc.subtitle: Shown that considering RS-warping, Planck mass at proton scale matches its observed mass

schwarzschild.title: Proton Schwarzschild Radius
schwarzschild.interpretation: 39 orders of magnitude smaller than observed radius
schwarzschild.details: This is the classical Schwarzschild radius for the proton mass. It shows that if the proton were a regular black hole, its horizon would be incredibly small.

planck.title: Planck Mass at r_p
planck.details: Planck mass scaled to proton size almost exactly matches its observed mass. This is a key observation of SIFS theory.

warping.title: RS-warping Factor
warping.details: Exponential mass suppression via RS-warping determines the proton's scale coordinate. This is a geometric parameter, not a fitted one.

horizon.title: Effective Horizon in 5D
horizon.details: In 5D bulk space, the effective horizon is much larger, but it is not observed in 4D due to the warping factor.

result.title: Unification Result
result.text: Proton mass does NOT need to be introduced as a parameter. It appears automatically as scale-suppressed Planck mass at distance r_p: m_p = M_Pl √ó exp(‚àík|S_p|)
result.subtext: Stability: Charge ‚Äî topological invariant of brane (conserved). Mass ‚Äî projection in 4D (suppressed). Energy can leak into bulk (evaporation distributed over S).

fractal_diagram.title: Fractal Hierarchy of Scales
fractal_diagram.subtitle: Ouroboros Principle: Self-similarity from Planck to Hubble

log_periodicity.title: Log-periodicity
log_periodicity.text: ŒîS ‚âà const between natural scales ‚Üí self-similarity

dimension.title: Fractal Dimension
dimension.text: D_f ‚âà 2 + Œ¥, where Œ¥ ‚Üí 0 at large scales

infinity.title: Infinite Nesting
infinity.text: Each scale contains structures of smaller scales and is part of larger structures. Micro-BHs at Planck level ‚Üî supermassive BHs in galaxies: one geometry.
